All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonResourceLocator
    Provides a resource locator for resources in this package.
    ContainerReader
    Provides a parser for epub 3 container files (META-INF/container.xml).
    ContentExtractor
    Provides unpacking of epub 3 files.
    ContentMerger
    Provides an merger for epub 3 html files.
    Epub3InputManager
    Provides an epub 3 to html task group.
    Epub3InputManagerFactory
    Provides an factory for epub 3 to html conversion.
    EPUB3ReaderException
    Provides an exception for epub reading.
    Epub3Task
    Provides an epub to html task.
    EpubResourceLocator
    Provides a resorce locator relative to this class.
    FeatureSwitch
    Provides a place to put feature switches, so that it is easy to find a list of features that can be toggled.
    LayoutEngine
    Provides a task group for running the Dotify formatter.
    LayoutEngineFactory
    Provides a task group factory for running the Dotify formatter.
    LayoutEngineTask
    The LayoutEngineTask converts an OBFL-file into a file format defined by the supplied PagedMediaWriter.
    ObflResourceLocator
    Provides a method to find resources related to OBFL
    ObflResourceLocator.ObflResourceIdentifier
    Provides identifiers that can be used to locate specific resources maintained by this class.
    OPF
    Provides a data object for an OPF-file.
    OPFReader
    Provides a reader of OPF-files.
    TaskCreationException
    Provides a task creation exception.
    TextIdentifier
    Provides an identifier for text files.
    TextIdentifierFactory
    Provides a factory for identifying text files.
    TextInputManagerFactory
    Provides a task group factory for text input.
    TextNodeFilter
    StaxFilter that runs an ArrayList of StringFilter on all text nodes.
    TextNodeTask
    Task that runs a list of StringFilters on the character data of the input file.
    ValidatorException
    A ValidatorException is an exception that indicates conditions in the ValidatorTask that a reasonable application might want to catch.
    ValidatorFactoryImpl  
    ValidatorTask
    This task validates the input file against the given schema.
    XmlIdentifier
    Provides an identifier for xml files.
    XmlIdentifierFactory
    Provides a factory for identifying xml files.
    XMLInputManager
    Provides a method to determine the input format and load the appropriate settings based on the detected input format.
    XMLInputManagerFactory
    Provides an XML input manager factory.
    XMLL10nResourceLocator
    Provides a resource locator for xml localization data.
